bibl.title: Remarks on the Dates of Some Documents from Early Byzantine Egypt.
bibl.note: a. The dating formula in P.S.I. III, 162. - b. P. Lond. III, 958 descr. - c. P. Wisc. II, 58 and 59. - d. The names Aurelius Valerius used for both Diocletian and Maximian. - e. The consular dating formula in P.S.I. XIII, 1338. - f. The date of O. Wilcken II, 1306.
bibl.seg: Worp Klaas Anthony, Remarks on the Dates of Some Documents from Early Byzantine Egypt.
145.4 O. Wilcken II, 1306 P. Lond. III, 958 descr. P.S.I. III, 162; XIII, 1338 P. Wisc. II, 58; 59; 230
